__e: Charlie, call me an old-fashioned dad, but I was hoping my son wouldn't start betting on sports until he was old enough to have a drinking problem.
I might be old-fashioned, John, but I like to look a man in the eye, see what he's made of, before I decide whether to go to war with him.
Listen... At the risk of sounding old-fashioned isn't it time I knew your real name?
I say we should get the truth out of him, the old-fashioned way.
Then we do it the old-fashioned way...
Well, I guess we'll have to do this old-fashioned-like.
